about_the_game:
This is the Original Sound Track of Starship Scarwolf.

This content includes files in mp3 and ogg formats.

For convenience, the tracks are divided into Track 1 and Track 2, but both tracks contain the same musics in different formats. The differences are as follows:

  • Track 1: All musics are in mp3 format with a 320 kbps bitrate. For loop-structured tracks, the songs fade out at the end of the 2nd loop or at the beginning of the 3rd loop. For tracks originally designed to fade out, they fade out after 1 loop.

  • Track 2: All musics are in ogg format with a variable bitrate ranging approximately from 300 to 400 kbps. All tracks are in 1 loop, with loop-structured songs ending abruptly. This format is designed for loop playback on ogg-supported players. Tracks originally meant to fade out will fade out after 1 loop.

Note:

Ogg format files are not supported for playback in the Steam client (therefore, ogg files are excluded from the track list, but in fact both mp3 and ogg are included in the product). Please use any other ogg-compatible music player. Recommend  to enable loop-playback for most tracks.

For your health, please be very careful not to increase the volume too much.

How to Access Local Files:

1. Open the LIBRARY on the Steam client.

2. Select the Starship Scarwolf OST item.

3. (Install it if not already installed.)

4. Press the "Browse Local Files" button.

5. The installation folder will open, you can access to local files.

name: Starship Scarwolf OST

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Storage: 750 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
